<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Impaling Briars](/Feats.aspx?ID=4759) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=583" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 135 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[leaf order](/DruidicOrders.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

You can fill an area with devastating briars. You gain the impaling briars order spell (page 382).
name: Impaling Briars
